title: Smokey chipotle chicken & corn with black eyed bean salsa

ingredients.item: 4 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets
400g can black eyed beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Put the chicken and sweetcorn in the accompanying marinade bag with the chipotle rub and honey and give it a good shake to coat. Leave to marinate for at least 20 minutes (or do this in the morning, if you prefer).
To make the salsa, mix all the ingredients together in a bowl and set aside.

Preheat the oven to 190ÂºC, gas mark 5. Put the marinade bag in a roasting tin and cook for 25 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat. Take care when opening the bag as the steam inside will be very hot. Serve with the salsa.
